summary: TesterSeoContentBlock.tsx no longer shows the “Start Gamepad Testing” CTA button and the how-to text no longer references clicking that button. Some additional non-requested documentation/metadata files were also modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated repository metadata/documentation files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json) unrelated to removing the CTA button or editing the SEO block copy.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for changes within frontend/src/components/gamepad/TesterSeoContentBlock.tsx; these extra file modifications are not mentioned as required.
